EmailTemplate.name: Level 2 Alert for Plan Approval Stage
EmailTemplate.subject: Level 2 Alert -- Plan Approval Stage for "{!Account.Name}"
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Account.00N20000002FnOM},
The Data Collection duration for the entity {!Account.Name} has crossed 10 days.
Please accomplish the task as early as possible.
Thank You, Compliance Team.
